===================================================================
 LoveHateHero is a post-hardcore band from Los Angeles, California.
 They are signed to Ferret Records and have toured with bands such 
 as Chiodos, Eighteen Visions, Funeral for a Friend, He Is Legend, 
 and It Dies Today. They have two albums, Just Breathe and White   
 Lies. They released their second album on February 19th, 2007,    
 which has received mixed reviews from One Metal, Skyline Press and
 Punktastic.[citation needed]They appeared on the Black On Black   
 Tour with Escape the Fate, Blessthefall, and Dance Gavin Dance.
